explains: adv. 从生态学的观点看

sentences.en: The system is both practical and ecologically sound.
sentences.cn: 这个系统不但切合实际，从生态学观点来看也是合理的。

sentences.en: It is economical to run and ecologically sound.
sentences.cn: 它运行高效且有益生态。

sentences.en: The use of disposable products is considered ecologically unsound.
sentences.cn: 使用一次性产品被认为是没有顾及对生态的影响。
